page.title: 02LANDSCAPE FEATURES
page.content: {Failsworth Pole}is the spiritual if not geographical centre of the district and nearly opposite stands the {Pack Horse Inn.}Both are important in Failsworth past and present. A short distance from the Pole is the factory of {Failsworth {Hats }famous the world over and a reminder that the textile industry thrives in part. {Marlborough Mill}, adjacent to the {Rochdale Canal} was not demolished when its part was played. It was converted to house modern retail stores. {Moston Brook} is one of several land reclamation schemes designed to improve the inner city environment. Wild orchids have been seen growing here. {Newton Heath {Market} is a very popular attraction on Monday, Wednesday and Saturday. The river {Medlock }and {Daisynook} are major recreation areas.
